title: Beyond the first decade: The next phase for ESPI
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,220-220
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM90005G, Editorial
Elsie M. Sunderland, Kris McNeill
Editor-in-Chief Elsie M. Sunderland and former Editor-in-Chief Kris McNeill reflect on the first 11 years of ESPI and look forward to the rest of 2024 and beyond.
